name: Catch The Predator
description:
Our idea is to explore the theme of Decoy from its definition of the luring of prey by predators. 

Controls:

WASD or Left Stick - movement

Q or North Button - place decoy

Your objective is to successfully escape predators who want to kidnap you

Team: KreativeGamerz

Team Members:

Nhlanhla Langa

Kamogelo Maimela
